    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Convection currents within the mantle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Konvektionströme innerhalb des Umhangs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Courants de convection dans le manteau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Correntes do convection dentro do mantle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Correnti di convezione all'interno del manto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρεύματα μεταφοράς μέσα στο μανδύα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Corrientes de la convección dentro de la capa</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the convection currents within the Earth's mantle that transport the tectonic plates across the surface.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">convection currents</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">crust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Current flow</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mantle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Plate Tectonics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tectonic plates movement</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Konvektionströme 
innerhalb des Umhangs der Masse, die die tectonic Platten über der 
Oberfläche transportieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les courants de 
convection dans le manteau de la terre qui transportent les plats 
tectoniques à travers la surface.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra as correntes do convection
dentro do mantle da terra que transportam as placas tectonic através 
da superfície.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra le correnti di 
convezione all'interno del manto della terra che trasportano le 
piastre tettoniche attraverso la superficie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ρεύματα μεταφοράς μέσα 
στο γήινο μανδύα που μεταφέρουν τα τεκτονικά πιάτα πέρα από την
επιφάνεια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra las corrientes de la 
convección dentro de la capa de la tierra que transportan las placas 
tectónicas a través de la superficie.</string>
          </description>
